post.body: as a matter of fact... I am feeling a little nippy... maybe I should cover up... thanks :0)
ahhh.... just peachy keen are you! :0) Hope you get over you sickies quick... so sucks being sick... no fun - feel better! Hugs!
Well thank you... I try my best... he he... and as for the link.... WOO FREAKING HOO!!!! Damn that would be fun!!! :-)
(running) ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!
oh good morning to you... how yooooooooouuuuu doing? :-)
There really is no need to ever be awake at 4am, unless of course your night was THAT good and you are still awake! :0)
wow... impressive... I started following you yesterday... almost 1000 followers already... you must feel so loved!!! lol :0)
well I hope for you the suck of yesterday will find a way to creep out of today - good luck!!!
you're right on the money with that one... noooo snowballs for you... come back... one year!!!! :-)
lol... then I guess you of all would know... I understand his excitement :0)
That is just a horrid way to wake up... just horrid... hope your day gets better and your sickies go away!!! :0)
Your oh so welcome... have a fabulous day!!!
it's very possible... lol, whatever it was, he sure was excited!!! :0)
That is the largest.... and scariest freaking potato I have ever seen... I so would not eat that... lol :0)
lmao... interesting twist to a Christmas song right there... got a good giggle out of that one :0)
By far one of the best shows... even better when it came back the second time around!!
he he... :-)
That show is just the best... I could watch all day and never stop laughing!
lol... oh I am in a mood... join the fun!!!
well I don't know, do they? ;)
nice... I hope one day to travel to each and every one!
lol... sorta counts... I have lived in NH, ME, MA, TN... yup - that's it! :-)
They add new words to the Websters Dictionary every year... why can't they get rid of some each year? Why? Why? Spam needs to go!
One fav... no way... lol... English accents... Brazilian... Australian... so many get me going - LOVE IT!
Yes they are... and in reality... there is NO spam, that is good spam, that is just a bad word... a bad, bad word!
with a passion... omg... an accent is an absolutely phenomenal aphrodisiac!!!
maybe Twitter is cleaning out all the spammers... it is not you my friend... let them go... let..... them..... go!
Those people suck... and not in a good way... let it go... let them go - they SUCK!!!
oh my my... meow!
Oh no... you must be having withdrawals.... GO EAT NOODLES!!!!
Very much so... just the tip of the iceburg!
(shaking) what shall said ninja do once he has arrived at his location I wonder??? Just tape on the floor, I think not!
Everyone knows the word I speak of, but there is only one person who can say said word and make me melt, shudder, ahhhh
and now the ninja has realized he is powerless... this Silly Sue's location shall remain a myyyyyyyyyyyyyyyystery!!!
It's funny you should ask... but come to find out... it only takes one word to get this girl flustered... just ONE word!
you underestimate the powers of this Silly Sue... try me ninja... just try me!
Yes, yes you will - Sue wants proof of this mug!!!!!
he he, (gulp) what mug? :-)
Oh it will no doubt be a very "bangful" New Year's Eve... Enjoy yourself! :-)
Early is good!!! This is very good!!!
You really are getting married!!! awwww... the best wishes your way, talk about an incredible New Years!!!
Happy New Year's Eve!!!!!! Ring in 2009 with a bang!!!!! :-)
lol... indeed!!!
I'm on it!!!
Oh, I WILL spend that extra second good indeed!!! You do the same! Have an awesome New Year's Eve!!!
Much appreciated, can't wait to get the details on this one!!! :-)
lol... oh my goodness... please! More Details!!! (and I will be careful... what a mood killer!)
Starburst - YUM... What is YOUR favorite????? ;-) & of course have a kick ass New Year's Eve!!!!!!
friends, naa... we both went our separate ways... I'll tell ya, he was SO not laughing at the time, Italian... loved his hair, lol!!
aaaaaaahhhhh... ok, lol Thank you!!!
my typo free day is already over - damn....... shoot for tomorrow I guess :0)
is thinking my coffee has way too much cream in it... ick... cream in this case is just not a good thing!
is really enjoying my butt buddy free time... too bad it is not going to last... d'oh
is thinking of a certain someone all cozy in bed...
oingo boingo - that's all :0)
feels compelled to write a mini novel. I shall be here, but not.
has just checked my forgotten Yahoo account. Ouch. A lot of people are feeling ignored - hmm... tough cookies!
loves throwing out useless information about my life in 140 characters or less. Awesome.
<----------- has had these boots on for quite a while. Feet are getting sore! :-)
still needs to figure out a few Christmas presents....
has stalkers who seem to be cooling their jets - yay!
is watching a recorded episode of Family Guy.
is eating a banana.
wants a vodka & pineapple juice.
The DM's are coming in like crazy tonight - what is this madness... lol... I love this madness!!
loves being alone, but hates being alone, hmmm.... is it possible to do both at once... I'm thinking no...
is in such a mood tonight... whatever will I do...
Say this ten times fast... if you can that is... Toy boat. Toy boat. Toy boat.
Two episodes of the Office tonight? What is going on? I love this? But why......
loves people with accents!
oooooh.... Bloody Hell!
time to fold laundry, exciting right?
MD sandwich? Yes, please!
is a little flustered! *oh my*
Needs to stop drinking all this water... I do not want to have to stop on my ride!!!
is trying to calm down... not working! :-)
oooooOOOOOOoooooooooooOOOOOOOO only an hour left here and then I'm hitting the road!!!!!
Snow has begun... be kind snow! Flurries only, then cease!!!
I'd be counting hours now, but I'm just not exactly sure how many... thinking maybe around 8 and a half???? :-)
The lurker of all lurkers is here - d'oh... but leaving early so I will escape her clutches!!! :-)
